CmdLine: deps=' 		socat 	'; 	set -x; 	apt-get update 	&& apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends $deps 	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false 	&& apt-get clean -y 	&& rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
Commands.Name: run
